question_text: What is the main advantage of using Power over Ethernet (PoE)?
answer_options: It eliminates the need for Ethernet cables.
It allows power and data to be sent over the same cable.
It prevents signal interference over long distances.
correct_answer: It allows power and data to be sent over the same cable.
explanation: PoE enables devices like access points or VoIP phones to receive both power and data through a single Ethernet cable.
